message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can we meet in the middle?

new_offer: I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130.

message: I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. This is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit lower on my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $110?

new_offer: I understand you're on a tight budget, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to go a bit lower, but I need $125 to make it worth my while.

message: I understand you're on a tight budget, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to go a bit lower, but I need $125 to make it worth my while. This is my final offer for now.
I appreciate your time and effort, but I really need to stay within my budget. I'm willing to pay $120 for the product. This is my final offer.
